name: Crunches
details: This is a fat burning exercise. When these exercises are performed, the rectus abdominus and the oblique muscles are tightened.

name: Cycling
details: Cycling deacrese you body fat level. Increased muscle strength and flexibility and prevent you from many dieases

name: Jumping Jacks
details: This is most powerful exerice to lost weight.Jumping jacks work all the major muscles in the lower body, strengthening your glutes, hamstrings, quads, hips, calves, and shins.

name: Mountain Climber
details: Mountain climbers are an effective way of strengthening your arms, back, shoulders, core and legs.

name: Russian Twist
details: One of the best benefits of Russian twists is it whittles away the side fat. Russian twists are great calorie burners.

name: Sit Up
details: Sit-ups help you build a strong core to ward off injury, help with your posture, and boost your athletic performance
